name: Dark Side (itch) (SaturnX)
description:
I'm 10 years old and this is my first game. I made this game with the help of my dad for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1

Find your way through the level and get the items needed to make it to the end. Collect coins and jump on mummies. Mummies get your coins if you touch them.

Controls:
Move with arrow keys (Left, Right, Up, Down)
Jump with Space bar
Use the Hammer with "X" key
Use the TNT with "Z" key*

*Hit the "Z" key a lot the first time you try and use the TNT. [Bug]
